title: 2D Character Pack
description: This pack includes functions to create rapidly and easily a 2D character (moving, firing projectiles, tilt to the floor, jumping, crouching, open menu, animations)
longDescription:
With this pack, you can easily create a 2D character for your game. Include the following functions (with actor components to add these features to others characters/games) :


  • In the BasicsCharacter actor component :
  • Moving : Left/Right
  • Jumping : include multiples jumps feature
  • Crouching (and stop crouching)
  • Open menu
  • Fire a projectile


  • In the Tilt actor component :
  • Tilt your character : Change the tilt of your character depending on the slope (as you can see in the pictures)
  • Put your feet on the floor : Adjust the location of your character to put his feet on the floor


  • In the Animations actor component :
  • Animate your character : Set the animations of your character with your own flipbooks


  • In the Enemy actor component :
  • Enemy features : A 2D enemy that can rotate depending on where your character is, fire projectiles either in front of himself or on your character


You also have some blueprints, as examples :

  • 1 2D character blueprint (With keyboard controls, you can easily add gamepad controls to it)
  • 1 enemy blueprint
  • 2 projectiles blueprints (1 for the character and 1 for the enemy)
  • 1 widget blueprint


With each Function, you have at least a comment or an example (in a blueprint) to explain what you need to do to settle it.

A yellow comment is here to tell you that there is something you need to change in the function/node either to make it work or adjust it.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  Actor components Blueprints for each function (moving, firing, jumping, crouching, opening menu, tilt the character, put character's feet on floor, animations for the character, enemy looking and/or firing at character)
  •  Examples blueprints that show you how to use the actor components (for 2D character, enemy, projectiles, widget)
  •  1 example level with an enemy, some slopes and a player start



Number of Blueprints: 9 (+ 1 example level)

Input: (If any, please include which methods of input are preconfigured (Gamepad, Keyboard, Mouse... etc.)) Keyboard

Network Replicated: (Yes/No) No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Untested but should work

Documentation: (Link or a description of where users can find the documentation) Controls for the Example Level : Move right = D ; Move left = Q ; Jump = Space Bar ; Crouch = S ; Fire 1 time = E ; LoopFire (Fire as long as you press the key) = R ; Open menu = A ; Close menu = Escape.

Important/Additional Notes: Do not hesitate to ask your questions in the appropriate section, i'll do my best to answer it.
